title: The Writer's Almanac for Saturday, April 9, 2022
description: On this day in 1865 General Robert E. Lee surrendered his 28,000 Confederate troops to Union General Ulysses S. Grant, effectively ending the American Civil War.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this day in 1865 General Robert E. Lee surrendered his 28,000 Confederate troops to Union General Ulysses S. Grant, effectively ending the American Civil War.
